welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hamburg, where small town charm meets big city attractions! Explore our historic downtown, enjoy our beautiful parks, and discover why Hamburg is known as the "Gem of the Southtowns." We're thrilled to have you here and hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Gate 1 Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights at Buffalo Niagara International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dunkirk Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dunkirk Airport is responsible for handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
